content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][rev_slider_vc alias=”regjistrim-konferenca”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text]
7th ANNUAL INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE
Mobility Challenges in Transport and Public Safety
The conference is organized by the College of Applied Technical Sciences “Tempulli” in collaboration with the Faculty of Public Safety, Kosovo Academy of Public Safety, and is supported by the Institute for Road Safety and Transport Research, Albanian Safety Academy and Kosovo Motorization Association AMRKS.
This conference, unlike the conferences of previous years, has a scientific character and aims to create a new platform for eliciting issues related to public safety, traffic, transport, road safety, logistics, mobility, environment and alternative energy. The call for participation is open to all academics, researchers, teachers, experts and students of all technical sciences.
The research at the Conference will address issues from 10 areas:
  1. Urban Mobility
  2. Road Safety
  3. Public Safety
  4. Public Transport
  5. Logistics and Transport
  6. Infrastructure and Transport Intelligent Systems
  7. Road Vehicles and Insurance Systems
  8. Impact of Transport on the Environment
  9. Renewable Energy
  10. Social Impact of Traffic Accidents.
Important dates:
Deadline for submission of abstracts: December 6th, 2019.
Information on abstracts received: December 13th, 2019.
Deadline for submission of completed papers: December 31st, 2019.
Reviewing the work with comments and suggestions: January 8th, 2020.
Submission of revised papers – final version: January 11th, 2020.
The accepted papers will be published with ISBN number. Abstracts should be submitted in Albanian and English at this e-mail address: conference@localhost.
Venue: Kosovo Academy for Public Safety
Faculty of Public Safety
Vushtrri, Republic of Kosovo
The official ascertaining person of the conference is Msc. Diellza Boshnjaku, Assistant at Tempulli College: diellza.boshnjaku@localhost tel: +38344247044 (Viber and Whatsapp).
Sponsored by:
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]
Abstract submission 08.12 2019
Notification of abstract acceptance 15.12 2019
Submission of full paper 15.01 2020
Referred papers returned to authors for revision 17.02 2020
Final paper submission 15.03 2020
Registration and payment 19.04 2020
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]





[/vc_column][/vc_row]
